detail_desc: Long-sleeved V-neck top in softly draping viscose jersey.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. Seamless.
Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in light sweatshirt fabric with a flounce at the shoulder and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Super push-up lace bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft fine merino wool knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with front pockets, a detachable belt in braided imitation suede, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with contrasting colour panels down the sides.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft, crinkled jersey with lace details at the front and decorative ties at the top. Elastication at the top and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Top in soft fabric with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons at the top and long sleeves.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a faux fur collar, diagonal zip at the front, zipped side pockets and a tab and press-stud at the sides of the hem. Faux fur lining.
V-neck cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, front pockets and buttons down the front.
Jumpsuit in soft jersey with a collar, buttons at the top and flap chest pockets. Long sleeves, a seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt, and tapered legs.
Cap in a cotton weave with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Slim-fit jeans in stretch, coated denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and long sleeves.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a V-neck and gently rounded hem.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Metal rings in various designs.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a fastening at the top, a lined hood with a pompom, and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Top in a patterned weave with adjustable shoulder straps with a decorative bow and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Short, wide top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Cropped trousers in an airy weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and side pockets.
Short, straight-cut dress in ribbed jersey with short, flounce-trimmed sleeves, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Hats in soft organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print.

Short dress in lace with a stand-up collar, covered buttons at the back of the neck and cut-out section at the back. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Scalloped trim around the collar, cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Cap with a twill front and mesh back. Appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Fine-knit socks in soft chenille yarn with elasticated tops.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist and a glitter print.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in airy, plumeti chiffon with smocking and elastication at the top, 3/4-length flounced sleeves and a smocked hem. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist, long, slightly wider cuffed sleeves and a flared skirt. Lined at the front of the bodice.
Dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with ties at the waist. Gathered shoulders, short sleeves and a wide flounce at the hem.
Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with a wrapover front with a tie at one side and concealed buttons at the other and long sleeves with cuffs. Unlined.
Knee-length shorts in an airy denim weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Fine-knit cardigan in a merino wool blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Rib-knit jumper in soft chenille yarn. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with a collar, decorative press-studs and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with a top and boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey. Top with a racer back and elasticated hem. Briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Suit trousers in a woven fabric with studs, a regular waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, one back pocket and tapered legs with creases.
Top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline,cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Thermal longjohns in functional fabric with an elasticated waist and keyhole fly.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support.
Block-coloured T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Seersucker dress in a narrow cut at the top with a gentle flare to the hem. Elasticated top, narrow shoulder straps and a rounded hem.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves and a decorative hole pattern. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. Seamless.
Fishnet socks with elasticated tops.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a hood. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Shirt in a spot-print viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Shorts in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides with decorative straps, and a string back.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist and ties at the front. Side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Long dress in airy weave with a sweetheart neckline and draped, wrapover bodice with a concealed silicone trim at the top and support panels. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back, a seam under the bust, and a long, wide skirt. Satin lining.
Short-sleeved top in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and elastication and a wide flounce around the neckline. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist. Unlined.
Trousers in softly draping twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and slim legs.
Metal and plastic hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from 2 cm to 4 cm.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, long sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a ribbed polo neck, short raglan sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wrapover at the front of the waistband. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.

Top in soft viscose jersey with elastication over the shoulders and short sleeves with overlocked hems. Wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access, and a narrow, elasticated seam under the bust. The top can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Knee-length dress in slightly stretchy cotton satin with a collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves with narrow ties. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Tapered fit.
Lined, strapless bandeau bikini top with decorative trims at the hem and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Sleeveless, turtleneck body in stretch, ribbed jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a turned-up hem.

Lightly padded biker jacket in sturdy jersey with notch lapels and a diagonal zip at the front. Shoulder tabs with a press-stud, chest pocket, zipped side pockets and detachable belt with a metal buckle at the hem. Lined.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Straight-cut blouse in a textured weave with short, wide puff sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.
